sentences.en: A self - confessed workaholic, Tony can't remember when he last had a holiday.
sentences.cn: 托尼自己承认是个工作狂, 他记不起上次休假是什么时候了.

sentences.en: A workaholic is a person who works too much.
sentences.cn: 工作狂似工作过度的人.

sentences.en: A workaholic lives to work, rather than works to live.
sentences.cn: 他是为工作而活, 而不是为了生活而工作.

sentences.en: Born on a Saturday, you are likely to a workaholic.
sentences.cn: 你如果出生在星期六, 很可能是个工作狂.

sentences.en: Colleague: Oh, sorry, I've totally forgotten that you a workaholic.
sentences.cn: 同事: 噢, 对不起, 我完全忘了你是个工作狂.

sentences.en: Eighteen percent of 30-year-olds claim they are workaholics.
sentences.cn: 18％的30岁的人声称他们是工作狂。

sentences.en: He seems as though he has turned into a real workaholic.
sentences.cn: Workaholic,那是什么意思?是不是Bob生病了?

sentences.en: He was by his own account an ambitious workaholic.
sentences.cn: 据他自己所言，他是个雄心勃勃的工作狂。

sentences.en: I am not a workaholic, I can't stand working till late frequently.
sentences.cn: 我不是工作狂, 我不能忍受经常工作到很晚.

sentences.en: I do not want to become a workaholic.
I'm really worried about Bob. He seems as though he has turned into a real workaholic.
sentences.cn: 你很担心Bob,因为他成了workaholic. Workaholic,那是什么意思?是不是Bob生病了?

sentences.en: Others might say that I am a workaholic.
sentences.cn: 其他人可能会说我是个工作狂.

sentences.en: Saturday Born on a Saturday, you are likely to be a workaholic.
sentences.cn: 星期六你如果出生在星期六, 很可能是个工作狂.

sentences.en: She is a complete workaholic. Her job is her whole life.
sentences.cn: 她纯粹是个工作狂, 工作就是她生活的全部.

sentences.en: Workaholic: a person addicted to their work.
sentences.cn: 工作狂: 沉溺于工作的人.

words.tran_cn: 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的
工作日的；日常的；普通的，平凡的
日常的，工作日的；平凡的
工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；工厂；文学、音乐或艺术作品
同事，工友；一起工作的人
做重活的人；驮马；重负荷机器
使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进

trans.tran_cn: 工作狂，专心工作的人，醉心于工作的人，为免遭辞退而工作过份卖力的人
trans.tran_en: someone who chooses to work a lot, so that they do not have time to do anything else
